failure.message:
Total: 3 (Low: 1, Medium: 2, High: 0, Critical: 0)
===================================================================================================================
Resource: kind=Deployment/namespace=ns/name=test
Test: Images from allowed registry Severity: Medium Remediation: You should enable all trusted repositories in the parameters of this control. Link: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0078 Failed paths: - spec.template.spec.containers[0].image
Test: Ingress and Egress blocked Severity: Medium Remediation: Define a network policy that restricts ingress and egress connections. Link: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0030
Test: Image pull policy on latest tag Severity: Low Remediation: Set ImagePullPolicy to Always in all PODs found by this control. Link: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0075 Failed paths: - spec.template.spec.containers[0].image - spec.template.spec.containers[0].imagePullPolicy
